overview: Suhaagan Is A Bollywood Hindi Romantic Drama Movie, Directed By K. Raghavendra Rao, Starring Sridevi, Jeetendra, Padmini Kolhapure, Raj Babbar, Kader Khan And Shakti Kapoor In The Lead Roles. Jyoti Secretly Loves Ram, Who Is Married To Her Sister, Janki. Janki Elopes With Murli After Getting Bored Of Her Married, Family Life.
title: Suhaagan
